item.title: 日本立法者敦促养老基金投资国内私募股权基金
item.description: 一群日本执政党议员周三呼吁日本顶级公共养老基金 GPIF 扩大对国内私募股权和风险投资基金的投资，以加强国内私人资产投资链。【原文：A group of Japan's ruling party lawmakers on Wednesday called on the country's top public pension fund GPIF to expand investment in domestic private equity and venture capital funds to strengthen the domestic private asset investment chain.】

item.title: 欧洲对科技监管保持强硬态度，谷歌和 X 成为下一个目标
item.description: 据三位直接知情人士透露，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 可能是下一个面临欧洲监管机构罚款的公司，因为尽管担心美国会征收报复性关税，欧洲监管机构仍会对大型科技公司采取强硬措施。【原文：Alphabet's Google and Elon Musk's X may be the next to face fines from European regulators, as they stay tough on Big Tech despite concerns of retaliatory U.S. tariffs, according to three sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: AT&T 依靠捆绑计划新增用户数超预期
item.description: 本周三，AT&T 第一季度无线新增用户数超出华尔街预期，主要原因是市场对其捆绑高速光纤服务和 5G 移动产品的计划需求稳定。【原文：AT&T beat Wall Street estimates for wireless subscriber additions in the first quarter on Wednesday, driven by steady demand for its plans that bundled high-speed fiber services and 5G mobile offerings.】

item.title: 人工智能繁荣受到关税和全球经济动荡的威胁
item.description: 美国企业的人工智能投资热潮摆脱了对回报缓慢的担忧，也摆脱了对中国 DeepSeek 廉价制造的人工智能模型的怀疑。但是，特朗普政府挑起的全球贸易战有可能阻碍从能源到软件等各行各业的繁荣。【原文：Corporate America's artificial intelligence investment frenzy has shrugged off fears of slow returns and doubts fueled by AI models built cheaply by China's DeepSeek. But a global trade war started by the Trump administration threatens to stall the boom across industries from energy to software.】

item.title: 美国 美好的一天？
item.description: 今天美国和全球市场的重要事件。金融市场》欧洲、中东和非洲地区编辑 Dhara Ranasinghe 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today. A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Dhara Ranasinghe, Editor, Financial Markets EMEA.】

item.title: 首席财务官称，Temenos 正在追赶因特朗普关税不确定性而推迟的交易
item.description: 瑞士银行软件公司Temenos的财务总监周三表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）4月2日宣布加征关税，该公司上个月推迟了一些交易，但现在这些交易正在进行中，而且该集团在美国的发展计划也已步入正轨。【原文：Swiss banking software company Temenos had some deals delayed last month because of U.S. President Donald Trump's April 2 tariff announcement, but they were coming through now and the group's U.S. growth plans were on track, its finance chief said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特称 30% 运往美国的中国货物被取消
item.description: 德国集装箱航运集团赫伯罗特的一位发言人周三告诉路透社，受两个超级经济大国之间贸易冲突的影响，该集团的客户已经取消了30%从中国运往美国的货物。【原文：Customers of Hapag-Lloyd have cancelled 30% of shipments to the United States from China, spooked by the trade conflict between the two economic super powers, a spokesperson for the German container shipping group told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消费者支出不确定，宝洁盈利预测受关注
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）将于本周四公布第三季度业绩报告，届时该公司的年度目标将成为关注焦点，一些分析师预计，由于全球贸易紧张局势导致的支出不确定性，该公司的业绩预期将被下调。【原文：Procter & Gamble's annual targets will be in focus when the consumer goods bellwether reports third-quarter results on Thursday, with some analysts expecting a forecast cut due to uncertainty around spending amid global trade tensions.】

item.title: 关税可能意味着更多的美国钢铁岗位。会有工人来填补吗？
item.description: 阿肯色州密西西比县因钢铁行业的就业机会而繁荣，但却因劳动力短缺而苦苦挣扎。尽管工资不错，但工人们仍要长途跋涉或住在房车里。当地经济持续面临挑战，但仍努力通过住房激励措施和培训计划吸引人才。【原文：Mississippi County, Arkansas, thrives with steel industry jobs, but struggles with a labor shortage. Workers commute long distances or live in RVs, despite good wages. Local economic challenges persist, with efforts to attract talent through housing incentives and training programs.】

item.title: Benchmark Minerals 与 ICE 合作开发电池材料期货
item.description: BMI告诉路透社，洲际交易所（ICE）将在6月份推出的合约中采用咨询公司Benchmark Minerals Intelligence（BMI）评估的电池材料锂和钴的价格。【原文：Prices of battery materials lithium and cobalt assessed by consultancy Benchmark Minerals Intelligence (BMI) will be used for contracts launched by Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) in June, BMI told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普收回解雇美联储主席的威胁，美股期货跳涨；特斯拉跳涨
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统放弃解雇美联储主席的威胁并提高了与中国达成贸易协议的希望之后，美国股指期货周三大幅飙升。【原文：U.S. stock index futures leapt on Wednesday, after President Donald Trump backed off from his threats to fire the head of the Federal Reserve and raised hopes for a trade deal with China.】

item.title: 苹果公司因违反欧盟法律被罚款 5.7 亿美元，梅塔公司被罚款 2.28 亿美元
item.description: 周三，苹果公司被罚款 5 亿欧元（约合 5.7 亿美元），梅塔公司被罚款 2 亿欧元，这是欧盟反垄断监管机构根据旨在遏制大型科技公司势力的里程碑式立法做出的首批处罚。【原文：Apple was fined 500 million euros ($570 million) on Wednesday and Meta 200 million euros, as European Union antitrust regulators handed out the first sanctions under landmark legislation aimed at curbing the power of Big Tech.】

item.title: 关税动荡令欧洲银行 2025 年盈利能力蒙上阴影
item.description: 随着国际贸易关系的破灭和全球经济信心的跌落，欧洲主要银行正面临着这样一种可能性：2025 年最强劲的一个季度可能已经过去。【原文：With international trade ties in tatters and confidence in the global economy plumbing fresh depths, Europe's leading banks are confronting a possibility that their strongest quarter of 2025 may already be behind them.】

item.title: 台湾芯片制造商联电表示目前没有正在进行的合并 "活动
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商联华电子公司（UMC）周三表示，目前没有正在进行的并购 "活动"。【原文：Taiwanese chipmaker United Microelectronics Corp (UMC) said on Wednesday that there was currently no ongoing merger "activity".】

item.title: Check Point 软件公司第一季度利润和收入均高于预期
item.description: Check Point 软件技术公司第一季度利润超出预期，主要得益于其人工智能驱动的保护企业网络免受网络威胁产品的销售增长。【原文：Check Point Software Technologies beat first-quarter profit expectations, boosted by sales gains in its AI-driven products to protect corporate networks from cyber threats.】

item.title: 欧洲央行预计今年工资增长将大幅放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周三公布的数据显示，欧元区今年的工资增长预计将大幅放缓。【原文：Wage growth in the euro zone is expected to ease considerably this year, according to data from the European Central Bank released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 礼来起诉四家复配商仿制减肥药
item.description: 礼来公司周三表示，在美国法官上月禁止药店仿制其减肥药和糖尿病药后，该公司已起诉四家复方制剂生产商销售未经批准的含有替扎帕肽的产品。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Wednesday it had sued four compounders for selling unapproved products containing tirzepatide, after a U.S. judge last month blocked pharmacies from making copies of its weight-loss and diabetes medicines.】

item.title: 中国长城汽车董事长表示正寻求在巴西生产汽车
item.description: 中国汽车制造商长城汽车董事长周三在上海表示，长城汽车正在寻找机会将巴西作为汽车生产基地，并向附近地区扩张。【原文：Great Wall Motor is looking for opportunities to use Brazil as a base for vehicle production and expand to nearby regions, the Chinese carmaker's chairman said in Shanghai on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官表示，大众汽车在中国将经历 "适当规模 "的过程
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车集团首席执行官周三表示，随着过去几年电动汽车销售的蓬勃发展，中国这一全球最大汽车市场的竞争日趋激烈，大众汽车将需要在中国经历一个 "适当规模 "的过程。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen will need to go through a 'right-sizing' process in China, its group CEO said on Wednesday, as competition intensifies in the world's biggest auto market following a boom in electric vehicle sales in the past several years.】

item.title: InPost 签订协议，处理 Vinted 快递业务至 2027 年
item.description: 包裹柜公司 InPost 周三表示，该公司已与立陶宛在线市场 Vinted 达成协议，在 2027 年底前负责八个国家的包裹递送业务。【原文：Parcel locker company InPost has agreed a deal with Lithuanian online marketplace Vinted to handle parcel deliveries in eight countries until the end of 2027, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息称新加坡 PSA 正考虑出售长江和记港口业务 20% 的股份
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，新加坡 PSA 国际集团正在探讨出售其持有的长江和记港口业务 20% 的股份，加入了这家香港企业集团备受争议的出售计划。【原文：Singapore's PSA International is exploring the sale of its 20% stake in CK Hutchison's ports business, two people with knowledge of the matter said, joining the Hong Kong conglomerate in its controversial plans to sell.】

item.title: 欧洲预订量下降，经济忧虑可能拖累航空公司业绩
item.description: 欧洲航空公司将在未来几周内公布第一季度业绩，对利润丰厚的旅游旺季作出展望，而人们对经济不确定性可能导致需求放缓并威胁盈利的担忧与日俱增。【原文：European airlines are set to report first-quarter results in the coming weeks, offering outlooks for the lucrative travel season amidst growing worries that economic uncertainty could slow demand and threaten earnings.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 再推 10 款新车型，与汽车制造商进行电池交换
item.description: CATL 电池更换部门总经理周三在上海车展上表示，公司将与包括一汽、长安、北汽、奇瑞和广汽在内的汽车制造商合作，再推出 10 款用于电池更换的新车型。【原文：The general manager of CATL's battery swapping unit said on Wednesday at the Shanghai auto show that the company would launch 10 more new models for battery swapping with automakers including FAW, Changan, BAIC, Chery and GAC.】

item.title: 中国捷途将于第三季度在部分欧洲市场推出汽车销售业务
item.description: 奇瑞控股集团（CHERY.UL）旗下的中国运动型多用途汽车制造商捷途公司（Jetour）一位高管周三表示，该公司计划于第三季度在一些欧洲市场投放市场。【原文：Jetour, a Chinese sport-utility vehicle manufacturer owned by Chery Holding Group (CHERY.UL), plans to launch in some European markets in the third quarter, an executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 部长称中国华友将取代 LGES 参与印尼电动汽车电池项目
item.description: 印尼能源和矿产资源部长巴赫利尔-拉哈达里亚（Bahlil Lahadalia）周三表示，中国浙江华友钴业将取代韩国LG能源解决方案公司，成为印尼一个主要电动汽车电池项目的战略投资者。【原文：China's Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt is replacing South Korea's LG Energy Solution as a strategic investor in one of Indonesia's major EV battery projects, the country's Energy and Mineral Resources Minister Bahlil Lahadalia said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国 4 月份私营企业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，德国私营企业再次陷入萎缩
item.description: 周三的一项调查显示，受服务业困境和贸易相关不确定性的影响，德国私营部门的商业活动本月出现萎缩，不过制造商表现出了一定的恢复力。【原文：Business activity in Germany's private sector has contracted this month, hurt by service sector woes and trade-related uncertainty, although manufacturers are showing some resilience, a survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 博世首获中国人工智能高性能计算机订单
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商博世（ROBG.UL）周三在上海车展上表示，其高性能计算机已获得中国客户的首份订单，该计算机将用于打造具有人工智能（AI）功能的驾驶舱。【原文：Bosch (ROBG.UL) has received its first customer order in China for its high-performance computer, which will be used to create a cockpit featuring artificial intelligence (AI), the German car parts supplier said on Wednesday at the Shanghai auto show.】

item.title: 经济学家报》称，小股东正与捷克大亨克雷廷斯基洽谈收购普里萨公司事宜
item.description: 据《经济学家报》周三援引接近谈判的消息人士的话报道，西班牙媒体集团 Prisa 的小股东 Global Alconaba 正在与捷克大亨丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）商谈要约收购其股份事宜。【原文：Global Alconaba, a minority shareholder in Spanish media group Prisa , is in talks with Czech tycoon Daniel Kretinsky to make a tender offer on its shares, newspaper El Economista reported on Wednesday, citing sources close to the negotiations.】

item.title: 澳新银行任命 Raciti 为新加坡地区主管以及东南亚、印度和中东地区主管
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行（ANZ）周三表示，Chris Raciti 已被任命为澳新银行新加坡地区主管，负责监管澳新银行在东南亚、印度和中东地区八个市场的业务。【原文：Australia's ANZ said on Wednesday that Chris Raciti has been appointed ANZ country head of Singapore, with regional oversight for ANZ's businesses in eight markets across Southeast Asia, India and the Middle East.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国电商平台将在经济疲软的背景下终止 "退款不退货 "服务
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士说，中国政府已要求电子商务平台运营商停止坚持要求商家在不要求退货的情况下向顾客退款，以减轻商家的经济压力。【原文：Chinese authorities have asked e-commerce platform operators to stop insisting on merchants refunding customers without requiring the return of goods, to alleviate financial pressure on merchants, two people familiar with the matter said.】
